text: Barry George Hadlee was born 14 December, 1941 in Christchurch. He played two one-day internationals for New Zealand in 1975. He was the eldest son of Walter Hadlee and the brother of Dayle Hadlee and Richard Hadlee. ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch
title: Barry Hadlee
